dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependencies.name: py-networkx

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Falcon: a set of tools for fast aligning long reads for consensus and
assembly. The Falcon tool kit is a set of simple code collection which I
use for studying efficient assembly algorithm for haploid and diploid
genomes. It has some back-end code implemented in C for speed and some
simple front-end written in Python for convenience.
dependent_to.name: falcon

description:
pypeFLOW is light weight and reusable make / flow data process library
written in Python.
name: py-pypeflow

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
